verses.verse: And <WG2532> It Came To Pass <WG1096> On <WG1722> <WG3588> <WG2064> His Having Gone <WG846> Into <WG1519> A House <WG3624> Of One <WG5100> Of The <WG3588> Rulers <WG758> Of The <WG3588> Pharisees <WG5330> On A Sabbath <WG4521> To Eat <WG5315> Bread, <WG740> That <WG2532> They <WG846> Were <WG2258> Watching <WG3906> Him. <WG846>
And <WG2532> , Behold, <WG2400> A Man <WG444> Certain <WG5100> There Was <WG2258> Dropsical <WG5203> Before <WG1715> Him. <WG846>

And <WG2532> Answering <WG611> <WG3588> Jesus <WG2424> Spoke <WG2036> To <WG4314> The <WG3588> Doctors Of The Law <WG3544> And <WG2532> To The Pharisees, <WG5330> , <WG3004> Saying, <WG1487> Is It Lawful <WG1832> On The <WG3588> Sabbath <WG4521> To Heal? <WG2323>
<WG3588> But They <WG1161> Were Silent. <WG2270> And <WG2532> Taking Hold Of Him <WG1949> He Healed <WG2390> Him, <WG846> And <WG2532> Let Him Go. <WG630>

And <WG2532> Answering <WG611> To <WG4314> Them <WG846> He Said, <WG2036> Of Which <WG5101> Of You <WG5216> An Ass <WG3688> Or <WG2228> An Ox <WG1016> Into <WG1519> A Pit <WG5421> , Shall Fall, <WG1706> And <WG2532> Not <WG3756> Immediately <WG2112> He Will Pull Up <WG385> Him <WG846> On <WG1722> The <WG3588> Day <WG2250> <WG3588> Sabbath? <WG4521>
And <WG2532> <WG3756> They Were Not Able <WG2480> To Reply <WG470> To Him <WG846> As To <WG4314> These Things. <WG5023>

<WG3004> And He Spoke <WG1161> To <WG4314> Those Who <WG3588> Were Invited <WG2564> A Parable, <WG3850> Remarking <WG1907> How <WG4459> The <WG3588> First Places <WG4411> They Were Choosing Out, <WG1586> Saying <WG3004> To <WG4314> Them, <WG846>

When <WG3752> Thou Art Invited <WG2564> By <WG5259> Anyone <WG5100> To <WG1519> <WG1062> Wedding Feasts, <WG3361> Do Not Recline <WG2625> In <WG1519> The <WG3588> First Place, <WG4411> Lest <WG3379> A More Honourable Than <WG1784> <WG4675> Thou <WG5600> May Have Been Invited <WG2564> ' By <WG5259> Him, <WG846>

And <WG2532> Having Come <WG2064> He Who <WG3588> Thee <WG4571> And <WG2532> Him <WG846> Invited <WG2564> Shall Say <WG2046> To Thee, <WG4671> Give <WG1325> To This One <WG5129> Place, <WG5117> And <WG2532> Then <WG5119> Thou Begin <WG756> ' With <WG3326> Shame <WG152> The <WG3588> Last <WG2078> Place <WG5117> To Take. <WG2722>

' But <WG235> When <WG3752> Thou Art Invited, <WG2564> Having Gone <WG4198> Recline <WG377> In <WG1519> The <WG3588> Last <WG2078> Place, <WG5117> That <WG2443> When <WG3752> He May Come <WG2064> Who <WG3588> Has Invited <WG2564> Thee, <WG4571> He May Say <WG2036> To Thee, <WG4671> Friend, <WG5384> Come Up <WG4320> Higher. <WG511> Then <WG5119> Shall Be <WG2071> To Thee <WG4671> Glory <WG1391> Before <WG1799> Those Who <WG3588> Recline At Table With <WG4873> Thee; <WG4671>
For <WG3754> Everyone <WG3956> That <WG3588> Exalts <WG5312> Himself <WG1438> Shall Be Humbled, <WG5013> And <WG2532> He That <WG3588> Humbles <WG5013> Himself <WG1438> Shall Be Exalted. <WG5312>

<WG3004> And He Said <WG1161> Also <WG2532> To Him Who <WG3588> Had Invited <WG2564> Him, <WG846> When <WG3752> Thou Makest <WG4160> A Dinner <WG712> Or <WG2228> <WG1173> A Supper, <WG3361> Call Not <WG5455> <WG3588> <WG5384> Thy Friends <WG4675> Nor <WG3366> <WG3588> Brethren <WG80> Thy <WG4675> Nor <WG3366> <WG3588> <WG4773> Thy Kinsfolk <WG4675> Nor <WG3366> Neighbours <WG1069> Rich, <WG4145> Lest <WG3379> Also <WG2532> They <WG846> Thee <WG4571> Should Invite In Return, <WG479> And <WG2532> Be Made <WG1096> Thee <WG4671> A Recompense; <WG468>
' But <WG235> When <WG3752> Thou Makest <WG4160> A Feast, <WG1403> Call <WG2564> Poor, <WG4434> , Crippled, <WG376> Lame, <WG5560> Blind; <WG5185>

And <WG2532> Blessed <WG3107> Thou Shalt Be; <WG2071> For <WG3754> <WG3756> They Have Not Wherewith <WG2192> To Recompense <WG467> Thee; <WG4671> It Shall Be Recompensed <WG467> For <WG1063> Thee <WG4671> In <WG1722> The <WG3588> Resurrection <WG386> Of The <WG3588> Just. <WG1342>

<WG191> And Having Heard <WG1161> One <WG5100> Of Those <WG3588> Reclining At Table With Him <WG4873> These Things <WG5023> Said <WG2036> To Him, <WG846> Blessed He <WG3107> Who <WG3739> Shall Eat <WG5315> Bread <WG740> In <WG1722> The <WG3588> Kingdom <WG932> <WG3588> Of God. <WG2316>
<WG3588> But He <WG1161> Said <WG2036> To Him, <WG846> A Man <WG444> Certain <WG5100> Made <WG4160> A Supper <WG1173> Great, <WG3173> And <WG2532> Invited <WG2564> Many. <WG4183>

And <WG2532> He Sent <WG649> <WG3588> <WG1401> His Bondman <WG846> At The <WG3588> Hour <WG5610> Of The <WG3588> Supper <WG1173> To Say <WG2036> To Those Who <WG3588> Had Been Invited, <WG2564> Come, <WG2064> For <WG3754> Now <WG2235> Ready <WG2092> Is <WG2076> All. <WG3956>

And <WG2532> Began <WG756> With <WG575> One Consent <WG1520> To Excuse Themselves <WG3868> All. <WG3956> The <WG3588> First <WG4413> Said <WG2036> To Him, <WG846> A Field <WG68> I Have Bought, <WG59> And <WG2532> I Have <WG2192> Need <WG318> To Go Out <WG1831> And <WG2532> To See <WG1492> It; <WG846> I Pray <WG2065> Thee <WG4571> Hold <WG2192> Me <WG3165> Excused. <WG3868>

And <WG2532> Another <WG2087> Said, <WG2036> Pairs <WG2201> Of Oxen <WG1016> I Have Bought <WG59> Five, <WG4002> And <WG2532> I Go <WG4198> To Prove <WG1381> Them; <WG846> I Pray <WG2065> Thee <WG4571> Hold <WG2192> Me <WG3165> Excused. <WG3868>
And <WG2532> Another <WG2087> Said, <WG2036> A Wife <WG1135> I Have Married, <WG1060> And <WG2532> Because Of <WG1223> This <WG5124> <WG3756> I Am Unable <WG1410> To Come. <WG2064>

And <WG2532> Having Come <WG3854> <WG3588> <WG1401> That Bondman <WG1565> Reported <WG518> <WG3588> <WG2962> To His Lord <WG846> These Things. <WG5023> Then <WG5119> Being Angry <WG3710> The <WG3588> Master Of The House <WG3617> Said <WG2036> <WG3588> <WG1401> To His Bondman, <WG846> Go Out <WG1831> Quickly <WG5030> Into <WG1519> The <WG3588> Streets <WG4113> And <WG2532> Lanes <WG4505> Of The <WG3588> City, <WG4172> And <WG2532> The <WG3588> Poor <WG4434> And <WG2532> Crippled <WG376> And <WG2532> Lame <WG5560> And <WG2532> Blind <WG5185> Bring In <WG1521> Here. <WG5602>
And <WG2532> Said <WG2036> The <WG3588> Bondman, <WG1401> Sir, <WG2962> It Has Been Done <WG1096> As <WG5613> Thou Didst Command, <WG2004> And <WG2532> Still <WG2089> Room <WG5117> There Is. <WG2076>

And <WG2532> Said <WG2036> The <WG3588> Lord <WG2962> To <WG4314> The <WG3588> Bondman, <WG1401> Go Out <WG1831> Into <WG1519> The <WG3588> Ways <WG3598> And <WG2532> Hedges, <WG5418> And <WG2532> Compel <WG315> To Come In, <WG1525> That <WG2443> May Be Filled <WG1072> <WG3588> <WG3624> My House; <WG3450>

<WG3004> For I Say <WG1063> To You, <WG5213> That <WG3754> Not One <WG3762> <WG3588> <WG435> Of Those Men <WG1565> Who <WG3588> Have Been Invited <WG2564> Shall Taste <WG1089> Of My <WG3450> <WG3588> Supper. <WG1173>
<WG4848> And Were Going With <WG1161> Him <WG846> Crowds <WG3793> Great; <WG4183> And <WG2532> Having Turned <WG4762> He Said <WG2036> To <WG4314> Them, <WG846>

If <WG1487> Any One <WG5100> Comes <WG2064> To <WG4314> Me, <WG3165> And <WG2532> <WG3756> Hates Not <WG3404> <WG3588> <WG3962> His Father <WG1438> And <WG2532> <WG3588> Mother <WG3384> And <WG2532> <WG3588> Wife <WG1135> And <WG2532> <WG3588> Children <WG5043> And <WG2532> <WG3588> Brothers <WG80> And <WG2532> <WG3588> <WG79> Sisters, <WG2089> And Besides <WG1161> <WG2532> <WG3588> Also <WG1438> His Own Life, <WG5590> <WG3756> <WG1410> He Cannot <WG3450> My Disciple <WG3101> Be; <WG1511>

And <WG2532> Whosoever <WG3748> <WG3756> Carries Not <WG941> <WG3588> <WG4716> His Cross, <WG846> And <WG2532> Comes <WG2064> After <WG3694> Me, <WG3450> <WG3756> Cannot <WG1410> My <WG3450> Be <WG1511> Disciple. <WG3101>

<WG5101> For Which <WG1063> Of <WG1537> You <WG5216> Desiring <WG2309> A Tower <WG4444> To Build, <WG3618> Not <WG3780> First <WG4412> Having Sat Down <WG2523> Counts <WG5585> The <WG3588> Cost, <WG1160> If <WG1487> He Has <WG2192> The Means <WG3588> For Its <WG4314> Completion? <WG535>

That <WG2443> Lest <WG3379> Having Laid <WG5087> Of It <WG846> A Foundation <WG2310> And <WG2532> Not <WG3361> Being Able <WG2480> To Finish, <WG1615> All <WG3956> Who <WG3588> See It <WG2334> Should Begin <WG756> To Mock At <WG1702> Him, <WG846>
<WG3004> Saying, <WG3754> This <WG3778> <WG3588> Man <WG444> Began <WG756> To Build, <WG3618> And <WG2532> <WG3756> Was Not Able <WG2480> To Finish. <WG1615>

Or <WG2228> What <WG5101> King <WG935> Proceeding <WG4198> To Engage <WG4820> With Another <WG2087> King <WG935> In <WG1519> War <WG4171> Not <WG3780> Having Sat Down <WG2523> First <WG4412> Takes Counsel <WG1011> Whether <WG1487> Able <WG1415> He Is <WG2076> With <WG1722> Ten <WG1176> Thousand <WG5505> To Meet <WG528> Him <WG3588> With <WG3326> Twenty <WG1501> Thousand <WG5505> Who Comes <WG2064> ' Against <WG1909> Him? <WG846>

<WG1487> But If <WG1161> , Not, <WG3361> Still <WG2089> He <WG846> Far Off <WG4206> Being, <WG5607> An Embassy <WG4242> Having Sent <WG649> He Asks <WG2065> The Terms <WG3588> For <WG4314> Peace. <WG1515>

Thus <WG3779> Therefore <WG3767> Everyone <WG3956> Of <WG1537> You <WG5216> Who <WG3739> Not <WG3756> Does Take Leave Of <WG657> All <WG3956> That <WG3588> He Himself <WG1438> Possesses, <WG5224> <WG3756> Cannot <WG1410> My <WG3450> Be <WG1511> Disciple. <WG3101>
Good Is <WG2570> The <WG3588> Salt, <WG217> <WG1437> But If <WG1161> The <WG3588> Salt <WG217> Become Tasteless <WG3471> With <WG1722> What <WG5101> Shall It Be Seasoned? <WG741>

Neither <WG3777> For <WG1519> Land <WG1093> Nor <WG3777> For <WG1519> Manure <WG2874> Fit <WG2111> Is It : <WG2076> Out <WG1854> They Cast <WG906> It. <WG846> He That <WG3588> Has <WG2192> Ears <WG3775> To Hear <WG191> Let Him Hear. <WG191>
